Posts.Content: Hi  I'm just about to start chemo and my emotions are all over the place. It is just one big whirlwind, appointments ,blood test, having a port fitted and a clip in my breast to measure the size. I just want it to start. My 1st chemo is on the 8th Dec I to have to have herceptin my chemo is weekly for 12 weeks. It's good to read someone else is feeling the same as me. Good luck thinking of you  x Jane236
Posts.Title: Here goes...first day of chemo

Posts.Content: Hi dreamthief The pains are still there tho not as back. It's not period pain like it's more griping pains. I did ask yesterday at the hospital and they seem to think it's the steroids they are going to speak to Drs I'm seeing him on Monday so hopefully get done answers. I did a urine test to see if infection. Thanks again for replying  Janie x
Posts.Title: Stabbing pains in stomach

Posts.Content: Hi all  I'm on weekly paclitaxel and on the 4th day I get terrible pains in my stomach. They feel like someone is stabbing me also my urine becomes very dark. Last week they did a urine test and they put me on antibiotics. They have now finished and this week it's been really bad. anyone have any advice or has it happened to anyone else.  Jane
Posts.Title: Stabbing pains in stomach

Posts.Content: Hi  Thanks for replying. Do you still use dark gel nails or normal nail varnish. I do miss having mine done . The treatment is going ok just the normal symptoms.  Jane
Posts.Title: Nail care

Posts.Content: Hi I'm on my 5th chemo tomorrow and my nails have started to break. I've always had shellac and now I'm not sure if I can continue. Anyone have any advice  Jane
Posts.Title: Nail care

Posts.Content: Hi jojo I have 2 sons 23 & 25. My 25 year found it really hard hearing that I had breast cancer he looked up on google worst thing he could of done. He read all the wrong stuff. He kept on about not wanting to be without his mum. We sat down and I let him read the letters I had received from the hospital and all the info that had been given to me. It helped a bit. When he started telling his friends he got a lot of replies about how some of them had been through the same thing with family members. It has been a rough time for him but I think he is finally understanding.  Jane x
Posts.Title: Children

Posts.Content: Hi cocopops I have just finished 12 weeks of weekly paclitaxel. I used the cold cap and didn't lose my hair. I found I started to suffer after the 3 rd week. I did suffer with sickness and diarrhoea. I had nose bleeds and stomach pains. I had chemo on Thursday so usually my weekends were the worse days for me. By Tuesday I started to feel normal then on Thursday it all started again. I have been given my operation date in march which I'm quite nervous about. My lump had nearly disappeared so I know the operation isn't as bad as it could of been. I also have to have 3 weekly herceptin which I found stings like hell. I hope this helps as I felt like you when it started I kept thinking when will I be ill.  Janie xx
Posts.Title: Weekly Paciltaxel
